posts.post_content:
I'd like to get some 1911 t212's.  I prefer non-graded, in collectible condition, which to me means vg or ex.  

I'm also looking for a Ten Million card.  On that one, I'd probably go farther afield, condition-wise.  

Let me know if want to sell some.  Thanks.

will be listing a few under ebay ID pastime08 tonight.

Jason
